ValidationRule.description: Cannot switch from Blocked to Redirected or Vice Versa. Status must go to an active status so that all of the "On Hold" work flow actions can be completed for the first on hold status and then refreshed for the second on hold status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c,"Redirected"), On_Hold_Status__c = "Blocked" ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c,"Blocked"), On_Hold_Status__c = "Redirected" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot switch from one On Hold status to another On Hold status. Please set the Request Status to an active status (i.e. "In Progress") before selecting a new On Hold status.
